full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GSHIN RJE'I RGYAL PO SGO NAS CHOS RGYAL BZLOG BSGYUR BGYIS PA'I TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,

author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
